name: MEC Roam Bucket Hat - Unisex
description:
Don't let your brain bake or your scalp soak. Durable fabric protects you from sun and light rain and the dark underbrim reduces reflected glare.Woven nylon with UPF 50+ and DWR finish for rain protection.Breathable polyester mesh lining and embroidered eyelets vent heat.Soft polyester sweatband.Foam-stiffened brim floats and holds its shape.Removable chin cord with cord lock lets you cinch it down.

        Sustainability
